articles.title: AI Models May Be Developing Their Own 'Survival Drive', Researchers Say - Slashdot
articles.description: "OpenAI's o3 model sabotaged a shutdown mechanism to prevent itself from being turned off," warned Palisade Research, a nonprofit investigating cyber offensive AI capabilities.   "It did this even when explicitly instructed: allow yourself to be shut down."  …

articles.title: The Strange Lawsuit That Put A Chevy Beretta Inside Beretta's Headquarters - Jalopnik
articles.description: The strange lawsuit that put a Chevy Beretta inside the U.S. headquarters of the Italian gun brand involved GM's illegal use of the gunmaker's family name.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy XR Has Easy Sideloading & An Open Bootloader - UploadVR
articles.description: Samsung Galaxy XR supports sideloading APKs by default, without needing a PC or developer mode, and has an open bootloader too.

articles.title: I tried ChatGPT's Atlas browser to rival Google - here's what I found - BBC
articles.description: OpenAI hopes to upend the browser market currently dominated by Google Chrome, but it depends on paid users.

articles.title: Halo Esports 2026 Update | Halo - Official Site (en) - Halo Waypoint
articles.description: Earlier in the summer we announced that Year 4 would be the final year for Official HCS competition on Halo Infinite, and today at HaloWC we announced some more information about what competitors can expect in 2026. Competitive Halo is important to you, th…

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A glitch found to duplicate shiny Pokemon - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Brand new Pokemon Legends: Z-A glitch found to duplicate and clone shiny Pokemon - here's how it works and all of the steps.
